# Comments start with a hash (#) symbol
# This is an example requirements.txt file

# Package Name with Specific Version
requests==2.26.0
numpy==1.21.5
pandas==1.3.5

# Package Name with Minimum Version (compatible up to certain versions)
matplotlib>=3.4.3

# Package Name with Version Range (e.g., compatible with versions greater than or equal to 1.0 and less than 2.0)
Flask>=1.0.0,<2.0.0

# Package Name without Specifying Version (latest version will be installed)
tensorflow

# URL to a Package (e.g., GitHub repository)
git+https://github.com/username/repo.git@branch_name
